author: AdrianoDee
body:
#### PR description:

This PR fixes the bug introduced in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/46853 for HI Alpaka pixel wfs, as noted in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/46853#discussion_r1909641992.

#### PR validation:

`runTheMatrix.py -l 160.401 -w standard`
title: Fix for HI Alpaka Pixel Configs
